snippet.title: 20 things that make Dr. Sheldon Cooper TV's biggest geek
snippet.description: What makes The Big Bang Theory's Dr. Sheldon Cooper so geeky? TechRepublic contributor Edmond Woychowsky shares his list of top 20 reasons.
